name: Team Krull: Super Car Fighter - The Unbreakable Car
name_original: Team Krull: Super Car Fighter - The Unbreakable Car
description:
In this successor to 'MASH!', Saya returns to beat up inanimate objects - this time a supposedly indestructible car - how far can you go in this incremental game?

This game was made as a collaborative effort between the members of Team Krull:

Gregory Rutherford (UP2010541)

Sam Robinson (UP2010354)

Sadie Read (UP2004742)

Meg (953819) (On discord)

Our games are out of this world!

(This game unfortunately missed out on a lot of planned features, including upgrades - unfortunate but it is what it is :( )
